src/types/search.ts.description: Search types file contains SearchResultType, SearchResult, SearchQuery, SearchResponse, SearchState, and SearchActions interfaces. Also includes SearchInsightType matching InsightCard component. All types are re-exported from src/types/index.ts.

src/hooks/useKeyboardShortcut.ts.description: Keyboard shortcut hook for detecting key combinations with modifiers (Cmd/Ctrl, Shift, Alt). Main hook useKeyboardShortcut accepts callback and options object. Convenience hook useSearchShortcut specifically for Cmd/Ctrl+K. Handles event cleanup on unmount and case-insensitive key matching.

src/hooks/useGlobalSearch.ts.description: Global search hook using transcript_chunks table with ilike query. Implements 300ms debounce, returns SearchResult[] with max 3 results per recording for diversity. Uses useAuth() for user context and @tanstack/react-query for caching.
